classification_data.text: CERTIFICACIÓN COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA La suscrita Contadora Pública de PUNTO ESTRATÉGICO RED DE CONSULTORES SAS., identificada con NIT 900.343.420-7, hace constar que, de acuerdo con el libro oficial de registro de accionistas, inscrito en el registro mercantil, de conformidad con las normas de auditoría generalmente aceptadas en Colombia. CERTIFICA QUE: La composición accionaria es la siguiente: COINT: 72335489 NOMBRE DEL ACCIONISTA: ADALBERTO DE JESUS ESCORCIA GUZMAN NO. DE ACCIONES: 200.000 VALOR NOMINAL: $200.000.000,00 %: 100% TOTALES: 200.000, $200.000.000,00, 100% Se expide la presente certificación a solicitud del interesado a los diecisiete (17) días del mes de enero de 2020. Cordialmente, NADIA NIEBLES RACEDO Contador Público T.P. 113237-T Punto Estratégico Red de Consultores SAS

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step following the classification workflow. 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Let me extract all readable text from the document: The document shows: - Header: "CERTIFICACIÓN COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA" - Text about "PUNTO ESTRATÉGICO RED DE CONSULTORES SAS" with NIT 900.343.420-7 - It mentions it's a registered public accounting entity according to Colombian audit standards - "CERTIFICA QUE:" - "La composición accionaria es la siguiente:" - A table showing: - COINT: 72335489 - NOMBRE DEL ACCIONISTA: ADALBERTO DE JESUS ESCORCIA GUZMAN - NO. DE ACCIONES: 200.000 - VALOR NOMINAL: $200.000.000,00 - %: 100% - TOTALES: 200.000 shares, $200.000.000,00, 100% - Text about issuing this certification at the request of interested parties on January 17, 2020 - Signed by NADIA NIEBLES RACEDO, Contador Público, T.P. 113237-T, from Punto Estratégico Red de Consultores SAS 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - Not BLANK - has meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY - no hyperlinks or URLs 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - This is issued by "Punto Estratégico Red de Consultores SAS" which appears to be a corporate entity (accounting firm) - Not DIAN (no DIAN logo/header) - Not Chamber of Commerce (no "Cámara de Comercio" text) - Corporate entity issuing a certification 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** - This is clearly about shareholding composition - Shows ownership structure with specific shareholder name, number of shares, nominal value, and percentage - It's a certification of the shareholding composition (composición accionaria) 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** I recognize this as an Acciones (ACC) document, perfectly matching the shareholding composition criteria. The certification provides complete ownership details for a single shareholder, including 200,000 shares representing 100% ownership, with a total nominal value of $200,000,000.00. 6. **CONFIDENCE VALIDATION** The document exhibits robust evidence confirming its ACC classification. The structured format, clear shareholding details, and official corporate certification strongly validate its authenticity and comprehensiveness.
